summary: This is an email exchange between an FBI forensic accountant and another party regarding Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs) filed on Maxwell, with attached spreadsheets from UBS and JPMorgan Chase. The email requests UBS account schedules to prepare a follow-up subpoena.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: Sends SARs filed on Maxwell and attached spreadsheets from UBS and JPMorgan Chase to another party.

events.title: Email exchange regarding Maxwell SARs
events.description: An FBI forensic accountant sends Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs) filed on Maxwell and attached financial spreadsheets from UBS and JPMorgan Chase, with a request for UBS account schedules to prepare a follow-up subpoena.
personsInvolved: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office

keyFacts: Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs) were filed on Maxwell, indicating financial irregularities.
Financial spreadsheets from UBS and JPMorgan Chase were attached to the SARs.
A follow-up subpoena was being prepared based on UBS account/entity schedules.
The FBI New York Field Office was actively investigating Maxwell's financial activities as of June 2020.
